Text:
Este no es el Captifs esta película es una película holandesa Caged

This is not the movie Captif this is a Dutch film caged
Where can I find its english subtitles ?

Does anyone know where I can find English subtitles or an English audio copy of this movie?  I searched various subtitle websites and only found subtitles for a 2010 movie of the same title about three international aid workers who were abducted.
